title: U. of Florida Trustees Approve Ben Sasse as School’s Next President
description: Mr. Sasse, Republican of Nebraska, is expected to resign from the Senate by the end of the year to lead Florida’s flagship public university.
dc:creator: Michael Levenson

media:content.media:credit: T.J. Kirkpatrick for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Senator Ben Sasse of Nebraska will become the 13th president of the University of Florida, pending ratification by the Florida Board of Governors.
